title.native: セブンナイツ レボリューション -英雄の継承者-
title.romaji: Seven Knights Revolution: Eiyuu no Keishousha

description:
Long ago, Heroes had saved this world. Many Heroes fought against the powers of Destruction and protected the world. Years in the future… The Heroes had disappeared as the years passed and those possessing their powers called Successors now have the fate of the world in their hands. One of the elite Successors known as the Seven Knights is fighting an army of the Destruction when she saves a boy named Nemo. During the battle, Nemo awakens the powers of a Hero even he didn't know about and displays his powers as a Successor. But his Hero is someone who no one knew and no one ever spoke of.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: 七骑士：革命 -英雄的继承者-
เซเว่นไนท์เรโวลูชั่น ผู้สืบทอดแห่งวีรชน

node.description: __Arisa Matsuura__ is a Japanese animator, storyboard artist and character designer, who does animation direction.

[Website](http://meganebanchow.com/) | [Blog](http://meganebanchow.jugem.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MeganeBanchow)

Also worked on the music for Denpa Onna to Seishun Otoko as part of the unit Franz Maxwell I.
__Atsushi Watanabe__ is a Japanese art director.

**Graduated:** Waseda University, Faculty of Letters 1

**Satomi Tetsurou** is a Japanese producer and animation planner, who also provides planning assistance to various works. He is also the president of Barnum Studio, and the representative director for LIDENFILMS.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/52717833)

[Profile (Arts Vision)](https://www.artsvision.co.jp/talent/518/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/DaiKing_boy) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/daiki_yamashita_boy/) | [Website](https://yamashitadaiki.com/)

He is affiliated with Arts Vision and was the winner of the Best Male Newcomer award at the 8th Seiyu Awards in 2014.

Flumpool is a Japanese rock band of four from Osaka. The name is a compound word of f from the English word four, since there are 4 members, along with the word meaning mass, lump, and the word pool. Flumpool falls under the label of A-Sketch.

Yamamura has been writing the lyrics for almost all of their songs and Sakai has been doing the composing.

Members:
• Ryuta Yamamura (山村 隆太) - vocals, guitar
• Kazuki Sakai (阪井 一生) - guitar
• Genki Amakawa (尼川 元気) - bass
• Seiji Ogura (小倉 誠司) - drums

(Source: MAL)
__Arisa Matsuura__ is a Japanese animator, storyboard artist and character designer, who does animation direction.
__Yuuki Iida__ is a Japanese CG director, storyboard artist and animator, who does key animation and episode direction.
